name: Paul's Monster Adventure
description:
Prepare to embark on an epic adventure and enter a land where monsters known as bosses once ruled with an iron fist. The local inhabitants have rebelled against the bosses by stealing their food supply, slowly the bosses are dying from starvation, and it is up to you to save them.

Explore and discover magical items that will aid you on your adventure and interact with intriguing monsters that desperately need your help to regain their energy.

Be warned though, the inhabitants consider your heroic efforts as a threat and become aggressive if you are caught with food. You should do you best to avoid them, however, if needed you are equipped with a powerful hammer that will temporally knock out the inhabitants.

It’s time for you to step up to the challenge and become part of the legend of the one’s who restore order to this chaotic land.
